code: export const GLOBALTYPES={AUTH:"AUTH",ALERT:"ALERT",THEME:"THEME",STATUS:"STATUS",MODAL:"MODAL",USER_TYPE:"USER_TYPE",SOCKET:"SOCKET"};export const EditData=(data,id,post)=>{const newData=data.map(item=>item._id===id?post:item);return newData;};export const DeleteData=(data,id)=>{const newData=data.filter(item=>item._id!==id);return newData;};
